refsect1.title: Preliminaries
refsect1.para: Bidirectional snapshot replication allows you to set up snapshot replication between multiple servers where updates can be performed on all servers.

itemizedlist.listitem: Publisher-subscriber model where each table has only one publisher and when an update is performed on subscriber it goes to publisher first, and then to all other subscribers.
Conflict resolution may need to take place on the publisher when data coming from a subscriber is processed.
It is assumed that all published tables have primary keys and that primary key columns are never modified.

orderedlist.listitem: Login to the Conductor UI using the dba account.
Go to the "Replication" tab and then go to the "Bidirectional Snapshot" tab.
Enter table name or select the table using "Browse..." button and press "Add" button.
Connect to the Virtuoso server via ISQL utility as DBA user.
